commands.description: Commands that were actually executed. Can be empty for doc-only changes. Use batched commands (npm run check:quick) instead of running checks separately.

evidence.description: Brief proof summaries (not full command outputs). Examples: 'All checks passed', 'Tests passed (15/15)', 'CI passed - see PR checks'.

verification_status.description: Optional: Verification status. 'verified' = executed and observed, 'assumed' = logical analysis, 'unknown' = cannot verify. If omitted, defaults to 'verified' for backward compatibility.
